LanguageData.WorkManager.GlobalEnableTooltip: Enable automatic work type priority assignment system
LanguageData.WorkManager.GlobalDisableTooltip: Disable automatic work type priority assignment system
LanguageData.WorkManager.PawnEnableTooltip: Enable automatic work type priority assignment for pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.PawnDisableTooltip: Disable automatic work type priority assignment for pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.WorkTypeEnableTooltip: Enable automatic priority assignment for work type
LanguageData.WorkManager.WorkTypeDisableTooltip: Disable automatic priority assignment for work type
LanguageData.WorkManager.PawnScheduleEnableTooltip: Enable automatic schedule management for pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.PawnScheduleDisableTooltip: Disable automatic schedule management for pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_UpdateIn: How many times to update work priorities per in-game day
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_UseDedic: Try to assign a dedicated worker for every suitable work type
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_UsePawnL: Use individual skill learning rate thresholds
Use skill learning rate thresholds calculated for each pawn individually, considering their minimal and maximal skill learning rates
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_MajorLea: Pawns with skill learning rate above this threshold will be assigned to corresponding work types with priority value set below
Priority for work types with learning rates above major threshold
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_MinorLea: Pawns with skill learning rate above this threshold will be assigned to corresponding work types with priority value set below
Priority for work types with learning rates between minor and major thresholds
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_Recoveri: Recovering pawns are unfit for work
Do not assign work for pawns needing medical rest
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_AssignAl: Assign every pawn all leftover work types with priority value set below to prevent idling
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_AssignWo: Assign idle pawns all work types (except special ones) with lowest priority for 12 hours
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_SpecialR: Use special rules for doctoring assignment. These include assigning doctoring to highest-skilled pawn(s) only; assigning secondary doctor when primary doctor needs tending; assigning multiple doctors if multiple units need rescuing.
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_AssignMu: Assign multiple doctors when there are multiple downed pawns
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_CountDow: Each downed colonist will require additional doctor to be assigned
Each downed guest will require additional doctor to be assigned
Each downed prisoner will require additional doctor to be assigned
Each downed colony animal will require additional doctor to be assigned
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_SpecialR: Use special rules to determine which pawns are considered hunters
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Priorities_AllowMel: Allow barehanded pawns and pawns with melee weapons equipped to be assigned to hunting
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_WorkTypes_AssignEve: Work types listed in this section will be assigned to every capable pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_WorkTypes_WorkTypeN: The name of a work type
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_WorkTypes_WorkTypeP: Priority with which work type will be assigned to a non-dedicated pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_WorkTypes_AllowDedi: Allow work type to be assigned to the most suitable pawn with top priority
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_WorkTypes_WorkTypeN: This work type is absent from current game setup. It will not affect work assignment until the game is restarted with corresponding work type loaded.
LanguageData.WorkManager.Settings_Misc_VerboseLogging: Show mod execution details in log (only works when development mode is enabled)
